pinyin: ba1 xiao3 shi2 gong1 zuo4 zhi4

sentences.english: I've hired an hourly worker to help me clean my kitchen once a week.
sentences.chinese: 我僱了一個小時工，每星期來幫我打掃一次廚房。

sentences.english: Today is lodged at a friends house the shabby hourly workers.
sentences.chinese: 如今是寄住在朋友家的寒酸小時工。

sentences.english: Being salaried typically has carried higher status for employees than being paid wages.
sentences.chinese: 薪水比小時工具有更高的地位。
